___________

DESCRPITION
___________


This map was made with 3 textures only, dev textures (orenge and grey).
The map was completed in about 2 hours.
Map contanes:

-two bases
-a courtyard in the middle
-bomb house in the middle (bomb site in house)
-T's get and advantage for planting the bomb quickly
-CT's get an advantige for getting insode T's base quickly
-Map supports all weapons
-Map supports 32 spawns

When you play the map and the textures are blue and purple,
that means you don't have the textures I used.
Luckaly they are included in this download.
So please install them by reading the INSTALATION section below.


___________

INSTALLAION 
___________


(for map) place "maps" folder in cstrike folder

(for textures) place "materials" foldre in the cstrike

___________

ENJOY!
